text: Ra, jaba tiniharusita bhanincha ki allahale pradana gareko kitabamathi astha rakha, ta bhandachan ki juna grantha hamimathi utarisaki'eko cha, tyasamathi hamro astha cha. Jabaki tyasabhanda pachillo (kitaba) juna ki satya ho ra tinako (kitaba tauratako) pusti gardacha, tyosanga anastha rakhdachan. Tiniharusita yo sodha ki yadi timi aghilla kitabaharumathi astha rakhdachau ta pheri timile allahaka dutaharula'i kina maridinthyau
